content: please note that the paid pattern is the ad-free and printable pdf version of a free online pattern on supergurumi com **free english version** https //www supergurumi com/leaf-bookmark-crochet-pattern **free german version** https //www supergurumi de/blatt-lesezeichen-haekeln **free spanish version** https //www supergurumi com/es/patron-de-crochet-hoja-marcapaginas **free french version** https //www supergurumi com/fr/tutoriel-marque-page-feuille-au-crochet **free dutch version** https //www supergurumi com/nl/bladeren-boekenlegger-haken the leaf bookmark with absolute eye-catching guarantee **about the pattern ** crochet pattern leaf bookmark by supergurumi the crochet pattern comes as a printable pdf and is available in english us terminology german spanish french and dutch the pattern is written in detail and extensively illustrated available as an instant download after purchase the finished bookmark has a length of approximately 27 cm **materials used ** this pattern was crocheted using the „schachenmayr catania yarn 100% cotton meterage 125 m yarn ball weight 50 g yarn weight sport - 5ply / fine 2 in the following colors moss moos 412 chestnut marone 157 maygreen maigrün 389 2 5 mm crochet hook tapestry needle polyfill scissors 6 mm safety eyes **techniques you need to know ** slip knot chain stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet double treble_crochet color change ***have fun crocheting ***
